[1] Measurement of Soluble Mediators. [2] Pleural fluid was collected by flushing the cavity with 2 ml of PBS. [1] Statistics. [2] Data are expressed as means Â± S.E.M. Statistical significance was determined using the unpaired Student's t test if applicable, or results were analyzed by using one-way ANOVA, and if variances were nonhomogeneous, differences between groups were assessed using Dunnett's method with commercially available statistic software (GraphPad Software Inc., San Diego, CA). [3] P values <0.05 were considered statistically significant (â˜…, P < 0.05; â˜…â˜…, P < 0.01).
